attributes.action: Ban performing and promoting Nazi ideology with extremist intent online & public
attributes.additional_details:
Protecting National Security and Unity, In times of uncertainty and misinformation, the government must take a firm & clear stance against extremist ideologies to prevent their spread and acceptance. To safeguards national security, reinforces British values, and prevents division in society
Defending Britain’s Reputation and Heritage, to uphold its international standing, dignity, and historical commitment to fighting extremism. Honouring the sacrifices of those who defended our sovereignty.
attributes.background:
1.	Ban Nazi Salutes and Symbology: Make performing, promoting, or displaying Nazi salutes, symbols, or ideology with extremist intent illegal in public or online
	2.	Criminalise & investigate with Prohibition  all support, promotion, association, or funding of Nazi extremist groups or individuals

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714817
